title: Himi 229
lyrics:
M.NG
1.
’A kimoutolu kuo hao,
Pea kuo ‘ilo;
‘A e fakamolemole,
Mo e loto fo’ou.
2.
Mou ha’u, ke tau fiefia,
Pea fakafeta’i;
Ki hotau ‘Eiki, ko Sīsū,
Ko hotau Huhu’i.
3.
Ke tau fakaongo lelei,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Pea ke tau fai mo’oni,
‘A ‘etau pole’o.
4.
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki he Eiki lelei;
‘I he’ene anga’ofa,
Ki he kakai kovi.
5.
Na’a tau ‘i po’uli
Pea ‘iloange;
Na’e ‘ofa mai ‘a Sīsū
Kia kitautolu. *
